attributes.action: Rethink the change in Capital Gains Tax as it adversely affects individuals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have owned Shares or Unit Trusts for say 20 years you should have a large profit. Removal of Indexation and Taper Relief will typically double your tax bill if you do not pay 40%. This is a retrospective tax on your retirement fund. It's not just business that needs to ask the Chancellor to think again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
